overview:
Floating between new media and product design, as well as scripting and graphic production, Ascanio has always leveraged his ever-broadening knowledge.

Ascanio is a true “digital designer”, capable of filling any gap within tight task forces, “keeping it rolling” at all costs. A hardworker with no fear for dirty or painful jobs, he knows how every aspect of a project is a key to success. Precise, methodical and creative, he is used to meeting impossible deadlines and managing himself both within workteams and as a free lancer.

He is currently enjoying the opportunity of embracing the thrilling task of bringing design to agricultural vehicles for the first time, with Fiat Automobiles Group as Exterior and Interior Style Specialist in Turin, Italy.
